author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this sizzle reel to see some of the fantastic games created as part of the Unreal Fellowship: Games 2025!

The Unreal Fellowship is intensive, bootcamp-style training that aims to propel participants to new heights in game development. 

Over the course of three action-packed weeks, a talented assortment of designers, artists, programmers, modelers, and animators produced their own video games from scratch—with many diving into Unreal Engine for the very first time.

Check out our blog post for the inside scoop on how six of the participants developed their games: https://epic.gm/unreal-fellowship-games-2025

#UnrealFellowshipGames, #GameDevelopment, #UnrealEngine
title: Unreal Fellowship: Games 2025 | Sizzle Reel
